content: the wild berry dog sweater was designed to match with their humans wearing the wild berry pullover also available as a free pattern in sizes xs - 4xl available here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wild-berry-pullover this dog sweater comes in sizes small medium and large there is a sizing chart of actual sweater measurements included and a tutorial for the uneven berry stitch as well as the ribbing technique available on hearthookhome com a video tutorial will soon be added to the heart hook home youtube channel as well https //www youtube com/hearthookhome
